data.title: Fine Mickey D's!
data.text: As far as McDonald's go, this is a fine eatery. We mostly go for their breakfasts and eat in. There are many loyal patrons who gather regularly for breakfast in large groups---mostly seniors, and many Veterans like myself. I have been enjoying McDonald's food since I was 13 years old in 1963. I always eat at McDonald's on vacations a few times a year. Rarely do I ever get a bad meal. This location is always clean. Parking can be bad, now that they built a new bank, and it ate up most of McDonald's parking. The handicapped access is treacherous, as cars line up for a block in the drive-up lane, and you get blocked in with no way to get out. People pretend that they don't see you, and the line never gets smaller. That is a major concern for me since I am handicapped, and on more than one occasion, I have had to turn around and go home. Again, let me clarify---this is NO fault of McDonald's. They should have never been allowed to build a new bank, tearing up valuable parking.
